<<<api>>>: DataOutputStream.write
<<<code>>>: val byteArrayOutputStream = ByteArrayOutputStream()
bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, byteArrayOutputStream)
val byteArray = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray()
val base64String = Base64.encodeToString(byteArray, Base64.DEFAULT)
<<<explanation>>>: Here is how to convert a bitmap to a base64 string in Blackberry. First, create a ByteArrayOutputStream and compress the bitmap to JPEG format with a quality of 100. Then, convert the ByteArrayOutputStream to a byte array. Finally, use the Base64 class to encode the byte array to a base64 string.

<<<api>>>: DataOutputStream.write
<<<code>>>: fun bitmapToBase64(bitmap: Bitmap): String {
    val byteArrayOutputStream = ByteArrayOutputStream()
    bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, byteArrayOutputStream)
    val byteArray = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray()
    val base64String = Base64.encodeToString(byteArray, Base64.DEFAULT)
    return base64String
}
<<<explanation>>>: Here is how to convert a bitmap to a base64 string in Blackberry using the provided API. First, compress the bitmap to a JPEG format using the `compress` method of the `Bitmap` class. Then, convert the compressed byte array to a base64 string using the `Base64.encodeToString` method. Finally, return the base64 string.

<<<api>>>: DataOutputStream.write
<<<code>>>: ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, baos);
byte[] imageBytes = baos.toByteArray();
String base64String = Base64.encodeToString(imageBytes, Base64.DEFAULT);
<<<explanation>>>: This code snippet converts a Bitmap to a base64 string in BlackBerry. It first compresses the Bitmap to a JPEG format with 100% quality, then converts the compressed image to a byte array. Finally, it uses the Base64 class to encode the byte array into a base64 string.

<<<api>>>: DataOutputStream.write
<<<code>>>: private String convertBitmapToBase64(Bitmap bitmap) {
    ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
    bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, byteArrayOutputStream);
    byte[] byteArray = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray();
    String base64String = Base64.encodeToString(byteArray, Base64.DEFAULT);
    return base64String;
}
<<<explanation>>>: Here is how you can convert a Bitmap to a base64 string in Blackberry. First, you need to compress the Bitmap to a ByteArrayOutputStream. Then, convert the ByteArrayOutputStream to a byte array. Finally, use the Base64 class to encode the byte array to a base64 string.

<<<code>>>: ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, byteArrayOutputStream);
byte[] byteArray = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray();
String base64String = Base64.encodeToString(byteArray, Base64.DEFAULT);
<<<explanation>>>: You can convert a Bitmap to a base64 string in BlackBerry by first compressing the bitmap to a byte array using the Bitmap.compress() method with the desired compression format and quality. Then, you can convert the byte array to a base64 string using the Base64.encodeToString() method.
